pkgmetadata.longdescription: Phonetic Transliteration Between Hindi and English // Facilitate phonetic transliteration between different languages. With support for both Hindi and English, this package provides a way to convert text between Hindi and English dataset. Whether you're working with multilingual data or need to convert dataset for analysis or presentation purposes, it offers a simple and efficient solution and harness the power of phonetic transliteration in your projects with this versatile package.
